DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to measure ALA-induced fluorescence in both normal and malignant tissue.
DOC.brief_title: A Proof of Principle Study of Aminolevulinic Acid (ALA) - Induced Fluorescence Detection in Resectable Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients (12 total patients with lung cancer) meeting eligibility criteria will be enrolled. Preoperative diagnosis of either presumed or documented nonsmall cell lung cancer.
